tika.dc.description: From the host of the popular "Steve Harvey Morning Show" comes a funny, honest, and foolproof guide for all women that takes them inside the heads of men and shows how men think about love, sex, and commitment. Fans and those in need of tough (but ticklish) love advice should check out this book.
tika.dc.publisher: Aguilar, Altea, Taurus, Alfaguara, S.A. de C.V
tika.dc.subject: bestseller
